dct_title_s:
Africa, and its Several Regions and Islands according to the most recent
          Descriptions
dct_description_sm:
Even though the map depicts extensive knowledge of the interior, "the great rivers are
        inaccurately placed and the Nile erroneously appears to originate in two adjacent lakes in
        Central Africa"; Prime meridian through Ferro Island.
dct_rights_sm: Image from the Dr. Oscar I. Norwich collection of maps of Africa and its islands, 1486 - ca. 1865 courtesy Stanford University Libraries. This item is in the public domain. There are no restrictions on use. If you have questions, please contact the David Rumsey Map Center at rumseymapcenter@stanford.edu.
